amendment.description: To authorize funding for the Daniel Patrick Moynihan Global Affairs Institute Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1631 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1631 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11322-11323) To authorize funding for the Daniel Patrick Moynihan Global Affairs Institute Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1631 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1631 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1542.
